description:
Pestonya Shortcake Wanko is the Head maid of the Homunculus Maids of the http://anidb.net/ch95428 [Great Tomb of Nazarick]. She is one of the few NPCs who does not look down on normal humans and would prefer to be kind to them, alongside http://anidb.net/ch72781 [Sebas] and http://anidb.net/ch76788 [Yuri Alpha].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Pestonya Shortcake Wanko
